headline: Gartner Survey Finds 60% of Customer Service Agents Fail to Promote Self-Service
summary: STAMFORD, Conn., June 02, 2025--Sixty percent of customer service agents fail to promote self-service options, according to a survey by Gartner, Inc.

headline: Gartner Survey Finds Digital Channels Account for 61.1% of Total Marketing Spend
summary: DENVER, June 02, 2025--Digital channels now account for 61.1% of total marketing spend, according to a survey by Gartner, Inc. This digital dominance is reshaping strategies across industries, with seven out of 10 sectors dedicating more than 60% of their budget to online channels.
